Comment: (1-10), disyllabic and formed with the help of AO (subtraction) which has both base and atom
-ʋəttɪ/-əttɪ' also seems like an allomorph for 10
/i:ju/ '7' --> /eɽɑ/ '7' when used as a base of complex numerals
/eʈʈʊ/ '8' --> /em/ '8' when used as a base of complex numerals
/om-bəttu/ '9' --> /tom/ '9' when used as a base of complex numerals
